pr_title: [FLINK-16432] Fix dependencies in Hive Connector build

timeline.bodyText:
according to https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.pentaho/pentaho-aggdesigner-algorithm/5.1.5-jhyde

Note: this artifact it located at Spring Plugins repository (https://repo.spring.io/plugins-release/)
timeline.author: KurtYoung

replies.bodyText: Can we exclude pentaho like jms?
replies.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: not sure, what's the usage of this pentaho?
replies.author: KurtYoung

replies.bodyText:
This is dependency,  not a plugin. So this repo url is strange.
I'm not sure what the purpose of this library is. I have seen multiple projects where this exact dependency has been causing problems.
If there is a better way to fix this I'll gladly refactor my pull request
replies.author: nielsbasjes
